title: Edgemesh
longDescription:
Edgemesh enhances any browser, on any device, anywhere in the world — with intelligent, automated, next-generation client-side caching via a managed Service Worker. Learn more about how Edgemesh changes modern site performance — all with a single click on Cloudflare. https://edgemesh.com/

In addition to installing this App, you will need to create an account on https://portal.edgemesh.com and select a Plan.
instructions: In addition to Installing this App, you will need to create an account on https://portal.edgemesh.com and select a Plan.
author: Edgemesh Corporation

externalMount.description: Set this to true if another service worker will mount the Edgemesh worker. This will prevent the client from registering the Edgemesh service worker automatically.
externalMount.title: External Mount

host.description: URL to edgemesh services. Don't change unless instructed to by your dedicated Edgemesh engineer.
host.title: Host

lite.description: Metrics only mode. The service worker will not mount if this option is enabled.
lite.title: Lite

scope.description: Set the service worker scope to a custom pathname.
scope.title: Service Worker Scope
